6 30 6 14 single_crochet 1 increase 15 single_crochet 31 7 31 single_crochet 8 2 single_crochet 1 bobble st 5 single_crochet 1 bobble st 6 single_crochet 1 bobble st x 2 5 single_crochet 1 bobble st 2 single_crochet 31 sts without counting the chains made at the bobble sts we already have the five points of the star keep in mind that the bobble st can remain sunken when crocheting push it out properly with the back of your crochet hook or something that is not sharp 9 31 single_crochet take in account that you will not work on the chains you made before and after the double_crochet of the bobble sts so you will only crochet over the st in middle of these chains observe the picture to identify which this sts exactly are 10 15 single_crochet 1 decrease 14 single_crochet 30 11 3 single_crochet 1 decrease x 6 24 12 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 single_crochet x 6 18 13 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x 6 12 stuff well as you go not in excess 14 crochet 5 decrease only 7 close with yarn needle and fast off cut the yarn and weave ends 6 ⓒ 2023 aramigumi free pattern all rights reserved to mayte puerto owner of @aramigumi en color amarillo claro puedes hacer una carita en fieltro o tejerla como he hecho yo 1 7 cad empezar en la 2ª cad desde el ganchillo 2 5 pb 3 pb juntos 4 pb 1 aum 14 3 1 pb 1 mpa 1 pa 1 padoble 1 pa 1 mpa 1 aum 1 aummpa 1 aumpa 1 mpa 1 p desl juntos 1 p desl 1 mpa juntos 1 aumpa 1 aummpa 1 pb 21 hacer 1 p desl y rematar con una acabado * invisible coser o pegar al cuerpo de star los ojos y boca puedes bordarlos pintarlos en mi caso lo he hecho con fieltro marrón fíjate en la foto para identificar el piquito de la estrella superior * a la hora de pegar o coser la carita a star 7 ⓒ 2023 aramigumi free pattern all rights reserved to mayte puerto owner of @aramigumi with light yellow colour you can make a little face with felt or crochet it as i did you decide 1 7 chain start in the 2nd chain from the hook 2 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet together
